name: The Essence Reaper Ritual
description: The Essence Reaper Ritual is a classical epic fantasy RPG videogame where you lead a party of up to 5 adventurers. Your decisions will shape the world of Eternalia and the party members willing to join you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: •Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: •Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
